Description: Steatite shabti of Pediamenope with a lappet-wig, a carved face and ears, crossed hands in low-relief holding the two relief staffs, the legs are inscribed with Chapter 6 of The Book of The Dead in four(surviving) rows of incised Hieroglyphs extending almost around the whole body, the ankle and foot section is missing.
Condition: incomplete - ankle and foot section missing
